title: Caroline's Cottage Pie
ingredients: ['450g (1 lb) lean mince', '1 onion, diced', '3 carrots, diced', '2 tablespoons plain flour', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 tablespoon mixed dried herbs', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '350ml (12 fl oz) beef stock', '1 tablespoon tomato puree', 'salt and pepper to taste', '4 potatoes, peeled and diced', '50g (2 oz) butter, softened', '250ml (8 fl oz) milk', 'salt and pepper to taste', '125g (4 1/4 oz) grated Cheddar cheese']
